role_description: An Ansible role that installs McFly (which is an intelligent search engine for your terminal) on Linux and macOS
role_description_full_overview: [McFly](https://github.com/cantino/mcfly) replaces your default CTRL-r shell history search with an intelligent search engine that takes into account your working directory and the context of recently executed commands. McFly's suggestions are prioritized in real time with a small neural network.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs McFly (which is an intelligent search engine for your terminal) on Linux and macOS.
